data.title: illegal migrants caught heading for jobs in Malaysia
data.description: SONGKHLA - Twenty-four illegal migrants from Myanmar wanting to get jobs in Malaysia, a Thai driver and a Myanmar intermediary were arrested by police in Hat Yai district on Tuesday.

data.title: Extra public holidays next year approved
data.description: The cabinet has approved extra public holidays for next year and January 2026, declaring long-weekends to boost tourism and the overall economy.

data.title: Police round up crypto-mining power thieves
data.description: Police and electricity authorities have raided buildings in Chachoengsao and Surat Thani provinces, arrested suspects and seized  cryptocurrency mining  machines that stole tens of millions of baht worth of  electricity .

data.title: Woman killed by elephant at kathin ceremony
data.description: A woman was killed and two other people seriously injured by an agitated young elephant during a merit ceremony in the northeastern province of Bueng Khan.

data.title: Forestry employee arrested for rosewood theft
data.description: A forestry employee has been arrested in Udon Thani after intruders attacked staff and  stole 19 phayung logs  and two guns from a  forest conservation unit  in Sakon Nakhon province on Saturday.

data.title: Forest policeman arrested for rosewood theft
data.description: A former  forestry policeman  has been arrested in Udon Thani after intruders attacked staff and stole 19 phayung logs  and two guns from a  forest conservation unit  in Sakon Nakhon province on Saturday.

data.title: Rosewood logs stolen, arrest warrant for forest policeman
data.description: An arrest warrant has been issued for a member of the forestry police after armed men attacked staff and stole 19 phayung logs and two guns from a forest conservation unit in Sakon Nakhon province on Saturday.

data.title: Lawyer Sittra's employees held in B39m theft case
data.description: Police have arrested a couple employed by accused lawyer Sittra Biabungkerd, who is being held in police custody on charges of colluding to steal 39 million baht from a Thai woman who won a huge Euromillions lotto jackpot.

data.title: Bhumjaithai minister backs dept in SRT land row
data.description: Deputy Interior Minister Songsak Thongsri on Monday defended a land committee decision not to revoke land title documents issued for plots of land in Buri Ram’s Khao Kradong area.

data.title: Government defends Thaksin's role
data.description: Former prime minister  Thaksin Shinawatra  has the full legal right to assist in  Pheu Thai Party

data.title: BJT minister backs dept in SRT land row
data.description: Deputy Interior Minister Songsak Thongsri yesterday defended a land committee decision not to revoke land title documents issued for plots of land in Buri Ram’s Khao Kradong area.

data.title: Cooperation deal with Italy 'in the pipeline'
data.description: Thailand and Italy are working on a memorandum of understanding (MoU) on agricultural cooperation that will cover production, trade and investment, according to Agriculture and Cooperatives Minister Narumon Pinyosinwat.

data.title: Police seize 5m-plus meth pills in Saraburi
data.description: More than five million methamphetamine pills, one of the biggest hauls in recent months, have been confiscated in Saraburi, according to Provincial Police Region 1.

data.title: Buri Ram railway land decision defended
data.description: Deputy Interior Minister Songsak Thongsri defended a land committee decision not to revoke land title documents issued for plots of land in Buri Ram

data.title: BMA calls for 'foam-free' festival
data.description: Bangkok Metropolitan Administration (BMA) is asking city residents to go "zero-foam" for this year

data.title: Cops seize 5m-plus meth pills in Saraburi
data.description: More than five million methamphetamine pills, one of the biggest hauls in recent months, have been confiscated in Saraburi, according to Provincial Police Region 1.

data.title: New MoU with Italy 'in the pipeline'
data.description: Thailand and Italy are working on a memorandum of understanding (MoU) on agricultural cooperation that will cover production, trade and investment, according to Agriculture and Cooperatives Minister Narumon Pinyosinwat.

data.title: Exat delays N1 expressway tunnel project
data.description: Transport Minister Suriya Jungrungreangkit confirmed the Expressway Authority of Thailand

data.title: Amnesty bills expected in December
data.description: The ruling Pheu Thai Party expects to table an amnesty bill to parliament along with other versions from other parties on Dec 12 when the next parliament session starts, PM

data.title: BJT minister backs dept in SRT land row
data.description: Deputy Interior Minister Songsak Thongsri defended a land committee decision not to revoke land title documents issued for plots of land in Buri Ram

data.title: Walk-cycle lanes to reduce congestion
data.description: The Bangkok Metropolitan Administration (BMA) and the Thailand Walking and Cycling Institute Foundation (TWCIF) plan to develop a walking and cycling lane in four traffic-crowded areas of the capital, with a feasibility study wrapping up next month.

data.title: Govt defends Thaksin's role
data.description: Former prime minister  Thaksin Shinawatra  has the full legal right to assist in  Pheu Thai Party

data.title: No 'secret deal' over Koh Kut
data.description: The government has rejected claims that former prime minister Thaksin Shinawatra reached a secret deal with Cambodia

data.title: Thai police seize B70m worth of assets from celebrity lawyer
data.description: Police  have seized assets totalling over 70 million baht from celebrity lawyer  Sittra "Tam" Biabungkerd , 44, who is facing charges of fraud and money laundering.

data.title: National policy committee meets to discuss dead dugong
data.description: The National Policy and Planning Committee on Marine and Coastal Resources Management met on Monday to discuss the dugong crisis after an alarming increase in the dugong death rate over the past month.

data.title: Probe begins into cat poisoning scene in Thai drama
data.description: The Department of Livestock Development has begun investigating possible animal cruelty involving a drugged cat in the production of a Thai period drama.

data.title: Pyramid scheme charges filed against 18 The iCon Group suspects
data.description: The Department of Special Investigation additionally charged 18 detained suspects of  The iCon Group  with  pyramid scheme  and direct sales law violations.

data.title: Malaysia's security council to decide on border wall
data.description: The decision whether to build a proposed border wall in Malaysia along the riverbank across from Narathiwat province in Thailand will be made by Malaysia

data.title: Four arrested for B8m robbery of Ukrainian
data.description: Police have arrested four  foreign suspects  in the 8-million-baht  crypto currency armed holdup  of a  Ukrainian  in Phuket.

data.title: Govt denies Thai-Cambodian run-ins on Koh Kut
data.description: The government dismissed reports of confrontations between Thai soldiers and their Cambodian counterparts on  Koh Kut  as fake news while insisting the tourism situation on the island is still good.

data.title: Fengshui master arrested in alleged B108m fraud
data.description: Police arrested a popular  fengshui master  near Bangkok on Monday morning for alleged  public fraud  after complaints he had failed to deliver promised " auspicious objects " that cost followers about  108   million baht  in total.

data.title: Fengshui master arrested for alleged B100m fraud
data.description: Police arrested a popular  fengshui master  near Bangkok on Monday morning for alleged  public fraud  after complaints he had failed to deliver promised " auspicious objects " that cost followers about  10   0 million baht  in total.

data.title: Indian tourist found dead after falling down Samui waterfall
data.description: SURAT THANI - Searchers have found and recovered the body of an  Indian tourist  who  fell from a cliff  while walking to the top of a popular  waterfall  on Koh Samui.
